name: Otherworldly Stars
description:
Otherworldly Stars is an entry for Ludum Dare 33 48-hour competition. The theme was "You Are The Monster".

Otherworldly Stars has a graphical style inspired by the Ludum Dare 29 entry Beneath The Cave by feiss. The project was written using the Haxe programming language and uses three.js. It requires a recent graphics card and modern browser with WebGL support to run.

Rate the Ludum Dare entry: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=42276

Get the full source code here: https://github.com/Tw1ddle/Ludum-Dare-33

I'm on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Sam_Twidale
